10:15 <+sburjan> Good Morning vmassol  
10:16 <+sburjan> I wanted to ask you, if selenium tests are already duplicated in ui-tests, what should I do ?  
10:22 <vmassol> sburjan: you have an example?  
10:22 <vmassol> (good morning)  
10:25 <+sburjan> CommentTest  
10:30 <vmassol> I don't see any CommentTest in ui-tests  
10:30 <+sburjan> I'll start by porting the small ones. AdministrationTest in selenium is huge

12:25 <vmassol> sburjan: I think you should fix the test report for 3.0M1 to link to jira issues  
12:30 <vmassol> right now it ponts to incubator which isn't normal  
12:30 <vmassol> \* points

13:48 <+sburjan> vmassol: for M2 I won't create that page on Incubator (we'll have to find a better place, somewhere on .ORG). .. but I can't report all those in JIRA because some of them might be introduced between versions  
14:12 <abusenius> has quit  
14:14 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
14:19 <lucaa> has quit  
14:20 <+evalica> how do you like http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/KeyboardShortcuts ? :)  
14:23 <@sdumitriu> Nice keys  
14:24 <+evalica> thanks :P  
14:40 <esdaniel> has joined #xwiki  
14:41 <esdaniel> hi all, just a quick one - what's the inline markup for a comment in v2 syntax.. i.e in 1.0 syntax it's ##  
14:42 <+evalica> the ## is a velocity comment ... in v2 we don't have a markup for comment  
14:43 <esdaniel> thanks evalica... so i need to use {html}<!-- my comment -->{html} ?  
14:43 <+evalica> yeap .. or {{velocity}} ## {{/velocity}}  
14:45 <+rstavro> or (% style="display: none" %) comment (%%)  
14:46 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:46 <@sdumitriu> Avoid (% style="display:none" %)  
14:47 <+rstavro> well, yes, but it's also a solution :)  
14:47 <@sdumitriu> It's not a real comment, the text will end up in the HTML, and can end up if you select+copy+paste from the page  
14:47 <@sdumitriu> s/end up/be seen  
14:47 <+rstavro> right  
14:48 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <+jvelociter> esdaniel: we've discussed several time the possiblity of a syntax for comments  
14:49 <+jvelociter> I think there is even a JIRA for it  
14:50 <lucaa> has quit  
14:51 <abusenius> has quit  
14:51 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <esdaniel> thanks all, appreciate the dialogue, hope you're all having fun with the clouds ;-)  
15:03 <+jvelociter> if you are talking about the ones out the window in Nantes, it could be more funny :)  
15:03 <esdaniel> Nantes eh!? I'm going to be in St. Brevin L'Ocean this summer, might be chance for a few beers ;-)  
15:05 <+jvelociter> nice, beers sounds like a good idea :) You are staying there the whole summer ?  
15:10 <vmassol> esdaniel.jve   
15:10 <vmassol> esdaniel:  
15:10 <vmassol> XWIKI-4027  
15:11 <vmassol> fyi  
15:13 <+sburjan> vmassol: BasePage of ui-tests will need some review, we are reffering there to some bugs which are fixed.. but I won't touch those, dangerous class  
15:55 <+sburjan> vmassol: ping. I have a question  
15:56 <+sburjan> I was writing a test and I need a method to get the Document Title, which doesn't seem to exist  
15:56 <+sburjan> I have 3 options to solve this :  
15:56 <+sburjan> 1.Create a method in ViwePage called getDocumentTitle()  
15:56 <+sburjan> 2.Edit the page in WikiMode and get the Title from there  
15:57 <+sburjan> 3.Use contains method in the Assert (not very elegant IMO)  
15:57 <+sburjan> we already have a getPageTitle() in ViewPage, but that will get the Title fomr HTML head, which is longer and has other stuff in it  
15:57 <+sburjan> WDUY ?  
15:58 <+sburjan> \*WDYT ?  
15:59 <vmassol> 1 and 2 are valid, they're not the same use case IMO  
16:00 <+sburjan> nop. The true use case would be the first choice.  
16:00 <+sburjan> so I have a green light to implement 1) ?  
16:00 <vmassol> sounds ok yes  
16:01 <+sburjan> okay. tomorrow I'll attach a patch .. wrote 3 classes for only 30 lines of test code :)  
16:01 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:01 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
16:07 <+sburjan> worked like a charm  
16:12 <+sburjan> vmassol: what do I have to add after the GPL statement in order to get the version and author in the commit ? I forgot the variables  
16:12 <+sburjan> @version and @since  
16:13 <@sdumitriu> @version $Id$  
16:13 <+sburjan> thanks  
16:14 <+sburjan> and since .. I'll let that blank  
16:16 <@sdumitriu> Since is the next version  
16:17 <@sdumitriu> It's not done automatically  
16:17 <@sdumitriu> Use 3.0M2  
16:17 <+sburjan> ok  
16:17 <+sburjan> sdumitriu: ultra short question. it seems my eclipse codestyle has changed some formatting stuff like :  
16:18 <+sburjan> -    @FindBys( {@FindBy(id = "tmLogout"), @FindBy(tagName = "a")})  
16:18 <+sburjan> +    @FindBys({@FindBy(id = "tmLogout"), @FindBy(tagName = "a")})  
16:18 <+sburjan> is that space necessary for best practices or something ?  
16:19 <@sdumitriu> No  
16:19 <@sdumitriu> IMO it shouldn't be there, so the correction is valid  
16:19 <+sburjan> I am using XWiki Java Code Formatter  
16:19 <+sburjan> okay, I hope vmassol won't get angry because of formatting changes  
16:20 <+sburjan> ok, tomorrow we'll have a patch :)  
16:21 <@cjdelisle> When there are a lot of code style changes which have to be made, I usually fix the style then I work on the code after. One little formatting change shouldn't matter though.  
16:22 <@cjdelisle> after meaning in separate patches.  
16:22 <+sburjan> no, but I prefer the default community has agreed on  
16:22 <@cjdelisle> OTOH a one line patch would be silly.  
16:23 <+sburjan> well the patch I'm creating isn't for fixing formatting issues ..  
16:25 <+sburjan> I have to run  
16:25 <+sburjan> see you tomorrow guys  
16:25 <@cjdelisle> see ya  
16:26 <sburjan> has quit  
16:32 <esdaniel> has left #xwiki  
17:20 <evalica> has quit  
17:21 <vmassol> guys I need to send the xwiki.org logo to promote xwiki.org on some external site. Which logo should I use?  
17:22 <vmassol> do we have a page on xwiki.org showing the official logo to use for that?  
17:22 <vmassol> I can find some on http://www.google.fr/images?hl=en&q=xwiki+logo&um=1&ie=UTF-8&source=og&sa=N&tab=wi but I'd like to use the "official" one  
17:22 <+jvelociter> vmassol: which xwiki.org logo ?  
17:22 <+jvelociter> the new one ?  
17:22 <+jvelociter> :)  
17:22 <vmassol> the only one that exists, ie the current one  
17:22 <vmassol> I guess....  
17:22 <+jvelociter> it should be with the .org  
17:22 <+jvelociter> ?  
17:23 <vmassol> I don't kno  
17:23 <vmassol> w  
17:23 <vmassol> it's not clear anymore  
17:23 <+jvelociter> (otherwise the place you are looking for is XWiki SAS intranet)  
17:23 <+jvelociter> hehe  
17:23 <vmassol> maybe this one: http://concerto.xwiki.com/xwiki/skins/albatross/logo.png  
17:23 <vmassol> ?  
17:24 <vmassol> or http://www.ow2.org/xwiki/skins/toucan/logo.png  
17:24 <+jvelociter> that's what I had in mind  
17:24 <+jvelociter> the later one  
17:24 <vmassol> or simply http://fortic-pdm.org/wiki/wiki/forticpdm.org/download/Sandbox/WebHome/XWikiLogo.png  
17:24 <vmassol> ok I'll use http://www.ow2.org/xwiki/skins/toucan/logo.png but we'll need to clarify this I think

22:37 <+lucaa> guys, when did we introduce the columns css classes (as described here http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/SpecialCSSClasses#HA.Generalclasses ) ?  
22:39 <@sdumitriu> column half?  
22:40 <@sdumitriu> XSCOLIBRI-217  
22:41 <@sdumitriu> I think that's 2.4  
22:43 <+lucaa> yes  
22:43 <+lucaa> hmm...  
22:44 <+lucaa> do we use them anywhere?  
22:44 <+lucaa> in the platform?  
22:46 <@sdumitriu> Yes  
22:46 <@sdumitriu> Many places  
22:49 <+lucaa> ah ok  
22:49 <@sdumitriu> Why? Do you need it to do something completely different?  
22:50 <+lucaa> no, no  
22:50 <+lucaa> I was just wondering  
22:50 <@sdumitriu> And were hoping that you can steal .column...  
22:50 <+lucaa> because the purpose partially overlaps with the columns container layout  
22:50 <+lucaa> didn't I?  
22:50 <+lucaa> without knowing?  
22:51 <+lucaa> what are the css names of the columns layout?  
22:51 <+lucaa> I could even "optimize" the columns layout to not include css if it's 2 or 3 and use this default one  
23:57 <lucaa1> has joined #xwiki  
23:57 <lucaa> has quit
